casebody.data:
Robert Allen WORTHINGTON, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 11329. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. June 4, 1951. Robert Allen Worthington, in pro. per. Ray J. O’Donnell, Cincinnati, Ohio, Joseph Bullock, Cincinnati, Ohio, for appel-lee.

Before HICKS, Chief Judge, and MARTIN and MILLER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

This appeal having been considered by the Court;

It is ordered that the judgment be affirmed on the Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law of the District Judge.
